channel.title: Requirments for items?
channel.description:
I just recentley posted a topic but i cant find a way to bump it :(
Where would i find the folder/file to change the requirments for a item?

item.title: Requirments for items?
item.dc:creator: @runormal runormal
item.description:
@runormal wrote:

[quote=“BurnInSilence, post:4, topic:178799”]czar = pimpscape
LoLoL =P
unless you notice anything REALLY different in the client, its pimpscape
download dodian and compare, you will quickly learn the difference
edit- im just waiting for some1 to flame saying dodian is better
use the source you want, not anybody else[/quote]
i see lol didn’t know that, um is that in client.java or where is it loocated

Read full topic

item.title: Requirments for items?
item.dc:creator: @runormal runormal
item.description:
@runormal wrote:

[quote=“BurnInSilence, post:2, topic:178799”]assuming your using pimpscape source, search
int CLAttack = server.RequirementHandler.GetCLAttack(wearID);
you can make an item require nearly anything =P
this for example uses the int CLAttack, which starts as
public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID)
oh and note, make sure if your adding your own requirement to a item, do the
if (REQUIREMENT - MINIMUM < 0) {
sendmessage(“You need MINIMUM to be able to WHATEVER”);
GoFalse = true;
}[/quote]

im in czar but ill try this any ways

Read full topic

item.title: Requirments for items?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

assuming your using pimpscape source, search
int CLAttack = server.RequirementHandler.GetCLAttack(wearID);
you can make an item require nearly anything =P
this for example uses the int CLAttack, which starts as
public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID)
oh and note, make sure if your adding your own requirement to a item, do the
if (REQUIREMENT - MINIMUM < 0) {
sendmessage(“You need MINIMUM to be able to WHATEVER”);
GoFalse = true;
}
